message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item that represents the increase in tax accrued but not yet paid from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see that there is a line item labeled "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 346025.72. 

Tax payable represents taxes that have been accrued but not yet paid, so an increase in tax payable indicates an increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid.

Therefore, the specific line item is "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" and the value is 346025.72.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '346025.72'}}
```
